title: Temporary support order based on probable paternity
context: [ยง584-6.5] Temporary support order based on probable paternity. In all contested paternity actions where a presumption of paternity as defined in section 584-4 exists, upon motion by a party, the court shall order temporary support for the child pending a judicial determination of parentage. [L 1997, c 293, pt of ยง8]
